item.title: On client. how i change the crown picture... like how.. please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

V1LL3:

in the cache file. ModIcon or something like that, .Png picture. change it to the one you want. Still need to be MODICON though. if its not another name. Compile. Run. Check , should be the icon you changed it to. Dont understand ? Ask for a more precise post with pic. In a hurry right now. xD

First off. If you have a sprites folder. Look in there for the crowns. If you do not, thereâ€™s a tutorial on adding them to the sprites folder OR you can edit them in the cache.

Read full topic
